name: Magical Crystals
description: Untouched nature adds 6 magical crystals to the world, accordingly to the 6 elemets: water,fire,earth,air,light,dark.Crystals grow on rock and can be mined to get small crystal shards.Crystal shards are used for magical purposes.Crystals themselves if mined with silk-touch can be then placed anywhere.If placed,they'll start spreading their power on the nearby grass, resulting in the magical moss growing around.
